chunk:
Burt's Bees Sensitive Night Cream (2019 formulation)

Brand: Burt's Bees

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: WATER, HELIANTHUS ANNUUS (SUNFLOWER) SEED OIL, GLYCERIN, CETYL ALCOHOL, CI 77947 (ZINC OXIDE), ZEA MAYS (CORN) STARCH, GOSSYPIUM HERBACEUM (COTTON) FLOWER EXTRACT, ORYZA SATIVA (RICE) EXTRACT, KAOLIN, ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF

OE BARBADENSIS LEAF JUICE, SUCROSE, BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA) BUTTER, ARTEMISIA UMBELLIFORMIS EXTRACT, JOJOBA ESTERS, BETA VULGARIS (BEET) ROOT EXTRACT, LECITHIN, SACCHARUM OFFICINARUM (SUGAR CANE) EXTRACT, HYDROLYZED JOJOBA ESTERS, FRUCTOSE, EUPHRASIA OFFICINALIS EXTRACT, CITRIC ACID, XANTHAN GUM, GLUCOSE, POTASSIUM SORBATE, ALCOHOL DENAT., SUCR

ALCOHOL DENAT., SUCROSE POLYSTEARATE, INOSITOL, TREHALOSE, SUCROSE STEARATE, BENZOIC ACID, PHENOXYETHANOL, SODIUM STEAROYL LACTYLATE, GLYCERYL LAURATE, SODIUM BENZOATE, SODIUM PCA

Directions: Instructions: Use in the evening after cleansing with Sensitive Facial Cleanser.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LO
Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
